jump_scares.spoiler: After pouring a drink, Herman heads back to his game and hears a loud bang from another room
Herman pulls away the sheets on his bed revealing no one is there. He then spins around and a man is standing behind him
Lights flicker down the hallway revealing a girl standing at the end of it
Herman spins his head back to the hallway but the girl is standing right in front of him
Herman spins around to face Clarissa and sees a man in underwear standing outside
The man in underwear is suddenly standing inside the house
Herman pulls away the sheets to reveal a screaming little girl underneath
The body lying on the table suddenly jolts upwards after the cameraman begins to cover her face with a sheet
After the police disappear, aliens suddenly appear in the field
Aliens appear in the field in front of the camera
Ayesha suddenly appears in front of the partially open closet and is shot by Larry
